Thank you! We have received your payment.  Please see below for shipping instructions.

Packaging Guidelines:

• Use sturdy box with adequate padding
• Remove loose cables and wrap separately
• Include detailed problem description
• Include your contact information
• Consider shipping insurance

Shipping Address:

JB Inverters
5330 W Palmer Dr
Banning, CA 92220

Thank you for choosing JB Inverters!

Best regards,
Jim
